items.sentence: I had to make a choice between Tom and Mary.
I have a boiled egg for breakfast every day.
I have a friend who speaks French very well.
You should know that I\'m in love with Mary.
Tom falls in love with every woman he meets.
Tom is the only person who knows about this.
Except for Tom, I didn\'t know anyone there.
Fortunately, Tom didn\'t get seriously hurt.
I haven\'t understood anything you\'ve said.
Tom and Mary are more or less the same size.
Tom and Mary are now alone in the classroom.
Tom and Mary are planning to come next year.
Tom and Mary are waiting for John and Alice.
Tom and Mary ate a six-course meal together.
Are you sure there\'s nothing else to drink?
Are you sure you don\'t want me to call Tom?
Are you sure you don\'t want me to tell Tom?
Aren\'t you a little young to be doing this?
Aren\'t you interested in foreign languages?
I always wanted to be a professional singer.
